column2:
plot_ly(x = ~s) %>% 
  # add traces 
  add_trace(x = ~s, # can omit 
            y = ~exp(s), name = "exponential") %>% # exponential *log(exp(x)) = x
  add_trace(x = ~s, # can omit
            y = ~s, name = "linear") %>% # linear 
  # y-axis; log scale
  layout(yaxis = list(type = "log",
                      title = "log(s)"))
